app.name: DomestIQ
app.tagline: Indlela ephephileko nehlakaniphileko yokuxhumanisa abasebenzi nemindeni
search.title: Fumana Abasebenzi
consent.title: Imvumo yobuFihlakeleko
consent.message: Sibuthelela begodu sisebenzise imininingwana yakho yomuntu ngokwe-POPI Act. Ngokuragela phambili, uvuma iindlela zethu zokulondoloza imininingwana.
landing.hero.subtext: DomestIQ inikela abasebenzi basekhaya amandla bona bafumane umsebenzi oqinileko, ophephileko — begodu isize amakhaya afumane isizo ngokuqiniseka. Ifounu qangi. Zoke iilimi ezili-11 ze-SA. Abasebenzi abakhokhi.
landing.worker.body: Iingidi zabasebenzi basekhaya eSewula Afrika zithembele emezwini womlomo bona zifumane umsebenzi olandelako. Nangabe umqatjhi akuyekela, kungasho amaviki ungasebenzi. DomestIQ ikutjhentjha lokho. Yenza iphrofayili yakho kanye. Ufumaneke. Ubhugwe. Ubuyekezelwe.
landing.worker.b1_desc: Sekuphelile ngamaviki ungasebenzi. Fumana ukubhuga efoununi yakho.
landing.worker.b2_desc: Ukubuyekeza, izirefurensi, ne-CV yobungcweti ekhula nayo yoke imisebenzi. Awusathomi phansi godu.
landing.worker.b3_desc: Amakhasimende aqinisekisiweko. Yazi bona usebenzela bani ungakafiki.
landing.worker.b4_desc: Akukho i-imeyili efunekako. Akukho ukutlola. Cindezela iinthombe bese uthatha isithombe.
landing.worker.b5_desc: Bhalisa begodu ukhulume ngesiZulu, isiXhosa, Sesotho, Afrikaans — iilimi ezili-11 ze-SA.
landing.worker.b6_desc: 100% simahla kubasebenzi. Ugcina yoke irandi oyifumanako. Akukho ikhomishini ethathwa kuwe.
landing.client.body: Ungasathembeli emezwini womlomo uthembe okuhle. Bhrawuza abasebenzi abaqinisekisiweko, abakaliweko hlanu kwakho. Bona umlando wabo womsebenzi, funda ukubuyekeza kweqiniso, begodu uxhumane ngemizuzu.
landing.client.b1_desc: I-ID ihlolwe, iinrekhodhi zobulelesi zihlungulwe. Yazi bona ngubani ongena ekhaya lakho.
landing.client.b2_desc: Izilinganiso zeqiniso ezivela emakhaya wamambala, nezirefurensi ezitloliweko ongazithemba.
landing.client.b3_desc: Ukusesha okusebenzisa GPS. Bona bona ngubani ofumanekako hlanu nawe nje.
landing.client.b4_desc: Bhuga kanye namkha kwesikhathi. Ikhalenda iyahambisana. Iinkhumbuzo ezizenzakalako.
landing.how.ws1_desc: Cindezela iinthombe ukhethe amakghono wakho. Akukho ukutlola okufunekako.
landing.how.ws2_desc: Amakhaya ahlanu nawe abona iphrofayili yakho, isilinganiso, nokufumaneka kwakho.
landing.how.ws3_desc: Khetha imisebenzi oyifunako. Beka isitjhejuli sakho neenlinganiso zakho.
landing.how.ws4_desc: Woke umsebenzi omuhle ukufumanela ukubuyekeza okudosela umsebenzi ongezeleko.
landing.how.cs3_desc: Thumela umlayezo namkha ubawa ukubhuga. Hlela izinto ngqo.
landing.how.cs4_desc: Ukubuyekeza kwakho kusize umphakathi begodu kubonge abasebenzi abahle.
landing.services.subtext: Kusukela kusizo lwasekhaya kuya emisebenzini yezandla. Abasebenzi babhalisa amakghono wabo. Amakhaya afumana lokho abakufunako.
landing.stories.s1_quote: Bengijayele ukulinda amaviki hlangana nemisebenzi, ngibuza abangani bona bayamazi omunye na. Nje ngifumana ukubhuga qobe veke. Abantwana bami bangakghona ukudla kuhle.
landing.stories.s2_quote: Angikghoni ukufunda kuhle kodwana iinthombe nama-ayikhoni kwenza kube lula. Ngazibhalisa ngedwa efoununi yami. Akukho isizo engilizingeko.
landing.stories.s3_quote: Ngaphambili, benginganabu bufakazi bokobana ngiyakghona emsebenzini wami. Nje ukubuyekeza kwami okungema-47 kweenkwekwezi ezihlanu kukhulumela mina. Amakhasimende ayangithemba ngingakafiki.
landing.stories.s4_quote: Ukufumana umsizi othembekileko bekutjho ukubuza abangani uthembe okuhle. DomestIQ ikutjhentjhe lokho ngokupheleleko.
landing.stories.s5_quote: Amabheji wokuqinisekiswa anginikela ukuthula komkhumbulo. Ngiyazi bona ngubani oza endlini yami. Lokho kuqakathekile nawunabantwana.
landing.stories.s6_quote: Ngibeka iinlinganiso zami ngokwami. Akukho umuntu othatha ingcenye. Ngifumene R8,000 ngenyanga edlulileko ngeDomestIQ kwaphela.
landing.cta.body: Woke umsebenzi oyakha iphrofayili yakhe uvula amathuba. Woke umuzi obhuga ngeDomestIQ wakha ukuthembana. Soke, siyakha into iSewula Afrika engazange ibe nayo — inethiwekhi yokuthembana yomsebenzi wasekhaya oqinisekisiweko.
landing.footer.disclaimer: DomestIQ yiphulathiforimu yokuxhumanisa. Akukho ubudlelwano bomsebenzi obubunjwako hlangana nabasebenzisi.
landing.faq.a1: Iye, 100% simahla. Abasebenzi bagcina yoke irandi abayifumanako. Asithathi ikhomishini emrholweni wabasebenzi. Iphulathiforimu ikhokhwa ngenkokhelo yesevisi encani ekhokhwa ngamakhaya.
landing.faq.q2: Ngabe ngifuna ifounu yesmathifounu ukusebenzisa DomestIQ?
landing.faq.a2: Ufuna ifounu ekghona ukufinyelela i-inthanethi. DomestIQ isebenza kunoma ngiyiphi ibhrawuza yesmathifounu — Android namkha iPhone. Akukho ukudawunilodwa kwe-ephu okufunekako. Ungaphinda uyifake kusikirini sakho sekhaya.
landing.faq.a3: Abasebenzi bangalayisha i-ID yabo ye-SA nesitifikethi sokungabi nalicala. Ithimba lethu liqinisekisa lamadokhumenti bese linikela ibheji yegolide ephelele kubasebenzi abaqinisekisiweko. Abasebenzi abaqinisekisiweko bafumana ukubhuga okunengi.
landing.faq.a4: DomestIQ ihambisana ngokupheleleko ne-POPI Act. Imininingwana yakho yomuntu i-enkhripthiwe, ayithengiselwa abanye, begodu yabelwa kwaphela ngemvumo yakho ecacileko.
landing.faq.a5: Nje sisebenza emadorobheni amakhulu afaka hlangana Johannesburg, Cape Town, Durban, Pretoria, ne-Port Elizabeth. Siyandzisa kuya emadorobheni amanengi. Bhalisa nje ngitjho nangabe indawo yakho ayikabikho.
landing.faq.a6: Amakhaya asesha abasebenzi ngohlobo lwesevisi nendawo, abona iiphrofayili nokubuyekeza, bese abhuga ilanga nesikhathi. Abasebenzi bafumana isibawo begodu bangayamukela namkha baale. Ungaphinda ukhulumisane nabasebenzi ngqo bona nikhulume ngeenqophiso ngaphambi kokubhuga.
landing.faq.a7: Kwamambala. DomestIQ isekela ukubhuga kwokwenza kanye nokwesikhathi. Ngitjho nangabe ufuna ukuhlanza kwokwenza kanye namkha umlimi wesimu wamasonto, sinakho.
landing.faq.a8: DomestIQ isekela zoke iilimi ezili-11 ezisemthethweni zeSewula Afrika ezifaka hlangana isiNgisi, isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Sesotho, nezinye. Abasebenzi bangabhalisa begodu bakhulumisane ngelimi labo abalithandako.
landing.cities.subtext: Abasebenzi namakhaya bayaxhumana emadorobheni amakhulu. Iyakhula qobe veke.
landing.cities.not_listed: Awuliboni idorobho lakho? Bhalisa nanyana kunjalo — siyandzisa ngokurhaba!
landing.pwa.title: Faka DomestIQ kuSikirini seKhaya
landing.pwa.desc: Fumana ukufinyelela okurhabako ekubhugeni, emilayezweni, nokunye.
